Package it.unipd.dei.se.faderic.analyzer

package it.unipd.dei.se.faderic.analyzer
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    it.unipd.dei.se.faderic
     
    it.unipd.dei.se.faderic.index

  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AnalyzerUtil
    The AnalyzerUtil class provides various utility methods for text analysis, including tokenization, loading of synonym and dictionary lists, and loading of Apache OpenNLP models.
    EnglishLongEvalAnalyzer
    The EnglishLongEvalAnalyzer class is an implementation of the Analyzer class in Java that performs text analysis on English text, including tokenization, filtering, and stemming.
    FrenchLongEvalAnalyzer
    The FrenchLongEvalAnalyzer class is used to create a set of token stream components for analyzing French text, including a tokenizer, filters for folding, elision, stop words, and stemming.
    PositionFilter
    The PositionFilter class is a TokenFilter that adjusts the position increment of tokens in a TokenStream.
    ShingleAnalyzer
    The ShingleAnalyzer class is a Java class that creates a token stream for a given text by breaking it into shingles of a specified size.
    SynonymAnalyzer
    The SynonymAnalyzer class is a Java class that analyzes text by replacing synonyms, removing stop words, and flattening the resulting graph.
    SynonymPOSAnalyzer
    The SynonymPOSAnalyzer class is a Java class that extends the Analyzer class and uses OpenNLP tokenizer and POS filter to analyze text and also includes a Synonym filter.
    SynonymPOSFilter
    The SynonymPOSFilter class is a Java implementation of a token filter that uses WordNet to find synonyms of input tokens based on their part-of-speech tags.
